FuncDef:
The srv6-te-policy backup hot-standby enable command enables HSB for all SRv6 TE Policies.
The undo srv6-te-policy backup hot-standby enable command disables HSB for all SRv6 TE Policies.
By default, HSB is disabled for all SRv6 TE Policies.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
SRv6 TE Policies are used to direct traffic to traverse an SRv6 TE network. To improve SRv6 TE Policy reliability, run the srv6-te-policy backup hot-standby enable command to enable HSB for all SRv6 TE Policies.
